Pizza Hut Civil Lines Allahabad. Get Pizza Hut Menu Price Address Phone Number Offers Reviews Photos on Justdial. Order Pizza online and Get Home Delivery in Civil Lines Allahabad.

One of the well-known outlets of the popular pizza chain Pizza Hut at Civil Lines Allahabad belongs to the Indian subsidiary of the parent company based in the United States. Founders Dan and Frank Carney started their own pizzeria in the year 1958 and since then there's been no looking back. Over the years they've come a long way with more than 13 200 outlets across the globe. In India the restaurant chain made its pioneering presence in 1996 with its flagship store in Bangalore. It has received many laurels for its food service and hospitality the most notable being 'Most Trusted Food Service Brand' by Brand Equity for 11 years in a row. Their exciting menu offers more than just their signature pizzas. Soups salads appetizers pastas desserts and beverages feature on the menu making it complete dining experience for the family. This particular outlet can be easily located at 31/31 Sardar Patel Marg. Undoubtedly it is one of the best pizza outlets in Civil Lines Allahabad.

The bright iconic logo of the brand atop Pizza Hut near Civil Lines Allahabad makes this venue easy to spot. An usher pleasantly greets customers right outside the outlet and leads them to their table. Enter the restaurant to the well-lit and radiant interiors. Adding to the inviting ambiance is the contemporary wooden décor and design of the venue. Stylish wooden dining chairs and polished tables are the seating arrangements in this spacious dining area. Be it couples or families diners belonging various groups and sizes can be comfortably accommodated here. Home delivery as well as take-away services are also available. Right from opening time the service crew is prompt in service. On the menu pizzas categorized as Magic Pan Pizzas Classic Pan Pizzas Cheese Maxx Pizzas and Overloaded Big Pizzas. Weekday Lunch meal and The Giant Dinner Meal Pizza options are also available. To know more about various offerings just scroll up and click on the 'Menu' button.
